articles.content: With rain pouring down, Eckstein recalled, people left the venues pool and sun deck to squeeze inside to the point you could hardly move. Masks were a thing of the past as a town of about 3,000 swell… [+11838 chars]

articles.title: Lambda COVID Variant 'a Potential Threat to Human Society,' Researchers Say - msnNOW
articles.description: Japanese researchers have warned of the variant which was first discovered in Peru in August 2020.
